com.amadeus.android.domain.hotel.models

Class DepositPolicy

  • com.amadeus.android.domain.hotel.models.DepositPolicy

  • @JsonClass
public class DepositPolicy

    the deposit/prepay policy information applicable to the offer. It includes accepted payments, deadline and the amount due

    • Constructor Detail

      • DepositPolicy

        public DepositPolicy(@Json @Nullable
                     java.lang.String amount,
                     @Json @Nullable
                     org.threeten.bp.ZonedDateTime deadline,
                     @Json @Nullable
                     TextWithLanguageType description,
                     @Json @Nullable
                     PaymentPolicy acceptedPayments)

        the deposit/prepay policy information applicable to the offer. It includes accepted payments, deadline and the amount due

        Parameters:
        amount - Deposit-Prepay amount
        deadline - The date and time of the deadline in ISO 8601https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime. Example: 2010-08-14T13:00:00 Please note that this value is expressed in the hotels local time zone
        description -
        acceptedPayments -
